author: jherby2k
body:
I've been using https://github.com/red-gate/XmlDoc2CmdletDoc to generate documentation for my binary modules, but the project is full framework (boo hiss!), Windows-only and seems dead.

I'm considering forking it and redeveloping as a cross-platform dotnet tool for PowerShell 6+, but before I do so, is there anything official in the pipe for generating xml documentation for binary modules? I don't want to waste cycles.

Thanks!
title: Binary module documentation generator question - XmlDoc2CmdletDoc?
